entry.tran: 自我服务的;(商店)自选的;(饭店)自助的
entry.def: A self-service shop, restaurant, or garage is one where you get things for yourself rather than being served by another person.

means.word_mean: 1. the practice of serving yourself (as in a grocery or cafeteria)
1. of or denoting an establishment (a restaurant or shop etc.) where customers serve themselves
